page.title: 07Services, Dowland area
page.content: A mobile library van, based in Okehampton tours the area with stops at Iddesleigh, Dowland Mill, Dowland and Upcott, once a fortnight, employing one driver and one librarian. The service is well used. A local bus company runs a bus twice a week from Iddesleigh to Okehampton, giving users 2 hours shopping time in the town. A school bus is run by a private firm paid for by the Education Authority. This bus transports children in Dowland to and from schools in Winkleigh and Chumleigh.
